bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon w/ Integrated tapered head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS (49cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), L (56cm), XL (58cm), XXL (61cm)
